name: vl-ui-alert
description: De "alert" UI component van Webuniversum Vlaanderen als Web Component
author: DIDM

scripts.prepare: npm update --dev vl-ui-util && npm run prepare:util
scripts.prepare:util: npm explore vl-ui-util -- npm run util
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:server:start && npm run test:e2e:chrome && npm run test:e2e:firefox
scripts.test:e2e:grid: npm run test:server:start && npm run test:e2e:chrome:grid && npm run test:e2e:firefox:grid
scripts.release:prepare: npm run release:prepare:build && npm run release:prepare:css && npm run release:prepare:commit
scripts.release:prepare:build: npm run release:prepare:build:es6 && npm run release:prepare:build:node
scripts.release:prepare:build:es6: npm run release:prepare:build:es6:copy && npm run release:prepare:build:es6:minify
scripts.release:prepare:build:node: npm run release:prepare:build:node:copy && npm run release:prepare:build:node:replace
scripts.release:prepare:commit: git add -f vl-alert.js && git commit --amend --no-edit && git pull
